titles.title: To permit taxpayers to treat contributions made to retirement plans before 2002 as contributions made to such plans during 2002.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/17/2001--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit qualified contributions to retirement plans made between the enactment of this Act and December 31, 2001, to be treated as if they had been made in 2002.
